name: Phishing Attack Simulation
description: Training to recognize, prevent, and respond to phishing attacks.

cards.title: Recognizing Phishing Attempts
cards.description: How to identify phishing emails, messages, and phone scams.
cards.bulletpoints: Email Headers, Suspicious Links, Urgency Cues, Spoofed Domains

cards.title: Simulating and Testing Phishing Attacks
cards.description: Conducting controlled phishing attack simulations to train employees.
cards.bulletpoints: Phishing Kits, Red Team Exercises, Threat Awareness Training
